pages.text: The $(mob)Ocelot$() is an animal that spawns in $(thing)Jungles$(). It flees when approached, but otherwise attacks nearby $(l:minecraft_chicken)$(mob)Chickens$() and causes $(l:minecraft_creeper)$(mob)Creepers$() to flee.$(p)Standing still and holding fish causes the $(mob)Ocelot$() to slowly approach. When near enough, it can be fed the fish which might tame it, changing its fur and causing it to follow its owner.
